english.segment1: Hold me stanley I love you. Love you. Love you. Not now Emily, Go away. Hold me Stanley I need you. Need you. Need you. Not now Emily, Go away
english.segment2: I should have stayed with Peter. I should have stayed with William. I should have stayed with Rupert. I should have stayed with Hal
english.segment3: Hold me stanley I love you. Love you. Love you. Not now Emily, Go away. Hold me Stanley I need you. Need you. Need you. Not now Emily, Go away
english.segment4: I should have stayed with Steven. I should have stayed with Allan. I should have stayed with Robert. I should have stayed with Hal
english.segment5: Maybe one day, I'll find love. Maybe one day, I'll find love. Don't tell me I'll do it. Seven times. There's nothing to it.
